archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0110
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to purchase a base plan that includes mobile data, calls and texts, so that I can use Vodafone's services

properties.value: OOTB, buy? Buy because this can also apply for an existing customer for which the plan didn't get renewed. He should be albe to buy a new plan and continue using the subscription.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
